Translations.Text: navu a nadannu budamelu golisibittevu mattu navu avara mele benda kanagala male surisidevu
cintane nadesuvavarige khanditavagiyu idaralli sucanegalive
adu (a nadu) ondu paricita dariyalle ide
visvasigalige khanditavagiyu idaralli sucane ide
innu, ‘aikah’ davaru khandita akramigalagiddaru
navu avara virud'dhavu pratikara tirisidevu – a eradu nadugalu heddariyalle ive
‘hijr’ emballinavaru dutarannu dhikkarisiddaru
navu avarige nam'ma aneka sucanegalannu nididevu. Adare avaru avugalannu kadeganisi bittaru
avaru nirbhitaragi parvatagalalli nivasagalannu koreyuttiddaru
(ondu dina) suryodayada velege, ondu bhari sphotavu avarannu avarisitu
avara yava sampadaneyu avara yava kelasakku baralilla
Akasagalannu hagu bhumiyannu hagu avugala naduve iruva ellavannu navu satyadondige srstisiddeve. Antima ghaligeyu khandita baralide. Nivu (janarannu) ksamisiri – adu atyanta sundara ksameyagirali
(dutare,) khanditavagiyu nim'ma odeyane mahan srstikartanu ellavannu ballavanu agiddane
khanditavagiyu navu nimage matte matte odalaguva elu vakyagalannu (prathama adhyayavannu) mattu bhavyavada kur‌anannu nidiruvevu

avarallina (dhikkarigalallina) vividha vargagalige navu enannu nidiruvevo avugaledege nivu kannettiyu nodabedi mattu nivu avara kuritu duhkhisabedi. Hageye, visvasigala palige nivu (vinayadeondige) nim'ma bhujavannu taggisidiri
mattu nivu ‘‘khanditavagiyu nanu, suspasta eccarike nidu vavanagiddene’’ endu sari bidiri
(i hinde) vibhajanavadigala mele navu (sikseyannu) eragisiddevu
avaru kur‌anannu chidragolisiddaru (tavicchisiddannu palisi, ulidudannu tiraskarisiddaru)
nim'madeyanane! Navu avarellarannu khandita prasnisuvevu –
– avaru maduttidda karmagala kuritu
